titles.en: Riviere and the Nation of the Prayer
titles.ja_jp: 祈りの国のリリエール

attributes.synopsis: He and she were enemies. Until he knew he had the same loneliness in a dichotomized world. They are cheap, strong, and never die. The ultimate life regeneration system "Arcadia" was born from teenage soldiers who fight by making full use of the complex regeneration . They were invincible boys and girls (children who transcended death) who died on the battlefield and revived. The forefront of the war in which the two great powers compete for hegemony. Akihito, a boy who leads a platoon as an ace of the United States Army, is ordered to collect confidential information that is inevitable to be wiped out because of his poor performance. However, Akihito, who has kept his companions in an unexpected battle and collapse, is isolated deep underground where complex regeneration is impossible, along with his fateful nemesis, the elite girl Philia of the Federal Army. Two people who have opposite personalities and skills and have the worst compatibility will cooperate and aim to return to the ground. The story of the encounter and resonance between him and her who continued to die on the battlefield that never died begins!
attributes.description: He and she were enemies. Until he knew he had the same loneliness in a dichotomized world. They are cheap, strong, and never die. The ultimate life regeneration system "Arcadia" was born from teenage soldiers who fight by making full use of the complex regeneration . They were invincible boys and girls (children who transcended death) who died on the battlefield and revived. The forefront of the war in which the two great powers compete for hegemony. Akihito, a boy who leads a platoon as an ace of the United States Army, is ordered to collect confidential information that is inevitable to be wiped out because of his poor performance. However, Akihito, who has kept his companions in an unexpected battle and collapse, is isolated deep underground where complex regeneration is impossible, along with his fateful nemesis, the elite girl Philia of the Federal Army. Two people who have opposite personalities and skills and have the worst compatibility will cooperate and aim to return to the ground. The story of the encounter and resonance between him and her who continued to die on the battlefield that never died begins!

attributes.canonicalTitle: Naite, Waratte, Ari no Mama no Kimi de

attributes.synopsis:
This is a story in which "four people" who have never been saved by anyone trying to save someone else. At the same time, it is a story that ends with "four people" being saved.

(Source: MFBunko, translated)

attributes.synopsis:
Side story compilation volume of the 86―EIGHTY-SIX light novel series. The volume includes short stories published in Dengeki Bunko Magazine and Kakuyomu, as well as unpublished and newly written short stories by Asato Asato.

- Anilist
